legacy.description: This appears on the button to change to legacy mode

suggested.description: This appears on the button to change to suggested mode

remember.description: Label for the password saving toggle

off.description: Shows the state of an option

copy.description: Shown on the copy password button

jsMessage.message: Diese Webseite braucht js um zu funktionieren.
jsMessage.description: Message shown when the user has javascript disabled

noPassword.description: Message shown when there is no outputted password

securityWarning.description: Shown when hovering on Legacy Mode

viewSource.description: Shown when hovering on the octocat in the corner. Also used by screen readers

description.message: Cloverleaf ist eine gratis, Open-Source App um deinen Passwortmanager zu ersetzen ohne deine Passwörter irgendwo zu speichern.
description.description: This is the description shown on search engines

langCode.description: The locale code of the language you're translating too

session.description: shown when hovering on the "Remember my password" toggle
